content: I think I'll start by experimenting with some simple icon designs using a tool like Adobe Illustrator. I've never designed an icon before, so it'll be a fun learning experience. I'll try to keep it simple and minimalist, maybe just a small leaf or a stylized flower. I like the idea of using a muted green accent color to tie in with the nature-inspired theme. Do you think it's a good idea to use a green color that's similar to the color of leaves or flowers, or should I choose a more muted, earthy tone?
